0.text: TARGET RANGE: 950

Active: Cho'Gath ruptures the target location after a 0.627 seconds-second delay, granting  sight of the area before dealing magic damage to enemies within and  knocking them up for 1 second, and afterwards  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Cho'Gath ruptures the target location after a 0.627 seconds-second delay, granting sight of the area before dealing magic damage to enemies within and knocking them up for 1 second, and afterwards slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

Active: Cho'Gath roars in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Cho'Gath roars in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Enemy  champions and  Rift Scuttlers hit are also  silenced for a duration.

silenced

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  500

Active: Cho'Gath empowers his next 3 basic attacks within 6 seconds to gain  50 bonus range and launch a blast of spikes on-attack in the target's direction. Enemies struck are dealt magic damage and  slowed by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 60 against  minions and  monsters.

minions
